activities: Information submitted by customers on our ecommerce website is used to process orders and payments, deliver products and services, administer sweepstakes and contests, and communicate with customers about orders, products, services and promotional offers, update our records and generally maintain customer's account with us, display content such as wish lists and customer reviews and recommend merchandise and services that might be of interest to customers. We also use this information to improve our website, prevent or detect fraud or abuses of our website and enable third parties to carry out technical, logistical or other customer service functions on our behalf. Information submitted by potential employees on our career website is used to process job applications and information collected from our employees is used for personnel management and operations.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc. EU Safe Harbor Program
recoursemech: Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc.  (BBB) EU Safe Harbor Program
